subject: VAM
description_text:
I want to purchase 3xVAM for 3rd party pedals (logitech)

Which control box do I need to buy?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jay,  Only one Plus X control box is required. However, please note that you may need to print the mounting bracket yourself.

Thank you for the clarification. I have 3D printer so no issue.

Will order next week, thanks again

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 3:52â€¯AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jay,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
